author: Chaim Dauermann
description: Bittersweet with fragrant bison grass vodka and fruity Maraschino cherry flavours supported by bitter gentian, rich elderflower and lime juice.
name: Zuzu's Petals cocktail
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
